unnormalised: tumchea mahite khatir, Bharat ani Pakistan hanchi cricket match 15/10/2024 disa dupara 2:30 voranim IST-ak asa, punn paus yetolo mhunn bhavishyani aslear ti adim korat. Ugddas dovrat ki saravicheo mechi sadharanponnim sokallim 10:00 voranim sthanik vellar suru zatat.
normalised: Tumkam mahit asonk, Bharot ani Pakistan hanchi cricket match pandhra Octobrak don hozar ani chovisak don vortukam tis minutam P-M I-S-T haka nirdharit asa, punn pavsacho andaz aslear ti poili korat. Ugddas dovrat ki sonvoi cheo matyo sadharanponn sokallchea dha vortukam local timak suru zatat.
text: tumchea mahite khatir, Bharat ani Pakistan hanchi cricket match 15/10/2024 disa dupara 2:30 voranim IST-ak asa, punn paus yetolo mhunn bhavishyani aslear ti adim korat. Ugddas dovrat ki saravicheo mechi sadharanponnim sokallim 10:00 voranim sthanik vellar suru zatat.
